metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6429 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The SourceHttpMessageConverter in Spring MVC in Spring Framework before3.2.5 and 4.0.0.M1 through 4.0.0.RC1 does not disable external entityresolution, which allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files, cause adenial of service, and conduct CSRF attacks via crafted XML, aka an XMLExternal Entity (XXE) issue, and a different vulnerability thanCVE-2013-4152 and CVE-2013-7315.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6429` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspring-aop-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-beans-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-context-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-context-support-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-core-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-expression-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-instrument-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-jdbc-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-jms-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-orm-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-oxm-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-test-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-transaction-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-web-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-web-portlet-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-web-servlet-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.6.RELEASE-13').
